name: .GH
summary: Learn about .GH files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

instructions: You can open a GH file in Grasshopper, which is included with McNeel Rhino (Windows, Mac). To open Grasshopper, enter grasshopper in Rhino's Command: field. After Grasshopper opens, select File â†’ Open and open your GH file. Then, you can edit the program your file contains and link it to the geometry in a 3DM file.
